Create a composting system: A composting system can be set up to help enrich the soil with nutrients. This can be done by creating a compost pit or bin, where organic matter such as food scraps, yard waste, and other organic materials can be broken down over time. Use drip irrigation: Drip irrigation can be used to water the plants in the garden. This method of watering delivers water directly to the roots of the plants, reducing water waste and helping to conserve water. This idea is zeemeez: 0.9

Build raised beds: Raised beds can be built to help improve soil drainage and aeration. This can be done using materials such as wood, metal, or plastic. The beds can be filled with organic soil and used to grow vegetables and other crops. This idea is zeemeez: 0.8
